subject: Zenyatta (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Breeders' Cup (Horse Race)
lead_paragraph: Gio Ponti will run in the Breeders’ Cup Mile rather than take another shot against the unbeaten Zenyatta in the Classic.
snippet: Gio Ponti will run in the Breeders’ Cup Mile rather than take another shot against the unbeaten Zenyatta in the Classic.
